short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide unwanted search results on Booking.com and other top travel websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plan your next vacation without clutter.

Tired of scrolling through unwanted search results on Booking.com?
AnyHide is here to help!

Key Features:
Cleaner Search: Remove unwanted search results to find exactly what you're looking. AnyHide helps you to focus on what matters most to you.

Works Everywhere: AnyHide works seamlessly in top travel and e-commerce websites: Booking.com, airbnb.com, TripAdvisor.com

Sync: Your activity is synced across all supported websites! Never see the same hotel on another website again.

Super Simple: Just click to hide. AnyHide's minimalistic approach augments you while you browse the same websites you know and love.

Privacy and Security: AnyHide respects your privacy and does not collect or store any personal data. Your browsing experience remains secure and protected.
